mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUE (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update: update setmeal set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from setmeal where status = 1
